pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dose Rate Estimation from in-Situ Gamma-Ray Spectrometry Measurements // Process in-situ Gamma-Ray Spectrometry for Luminescence Dating. This package allows to import, inspect and correct the energy shifts of Gamma-ray spectra. It provides methods for estimating the gamma dose rate by the use of a calibration curve. The package only supports Canberra CNF and TKA files.
